src:
Proses Pencarian Penyelam China Dilakukan Hingga Sepekan
06 Nov 2019, 23:24 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Proses Pencarian Penyelam China Dilakukan Hingga Sepekan

KBRN, Jakarta : Proses pencarian terhadap tiga penyelam Warga Negara Asing (WNA) asal China yang diduga tenggelam di sekitar Pulau Sangiang, Banten dilakukan hingga tujuh (tujuh) hari masa pencarian.Kepala Badan SAR Nasional (Basarnas) Banten, M. Zainal Arifin menjelaskan, hari ini, proses pencarian sudah memasuki hari ketiga. Sesuai standar operasional prosedur (SOP), proses pencarian akan dilakukan hingga sepekan lamanya."Secara SOP, kita pencarian 7 hari," katanya saat berbincang dengan Radio Republik Indonesia, Rabu (6/11/2019).Dijelaskan, luasan areal pencarian di hari ketiga ini sudah mencapai 922,5 nautical mile square. Proses pencarian dilakukan tidak hanya dilakukan di permukaan laut, tapi juga di udara, dan dari dasar laut."Dari udara kita menggunakan heli rescue, dari permukaan kita menggunakan kapal, kemudian di bawah air ada drone bawah air kita gunakan semua. Tinggal doanya dari teman-teman semua," pungkasnya. (Foto: Basarnas.go.id)
text:
The Search Process for Chinese Divers Will Be Done a Week
Nov 6, 2019, 23:24 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


The Search Process for Chinese Divers Will Be Done a Week

KBRN, Jakarta: The process of searching for three divers of foreigners from China who were suspected of drowning around Sangiang Island, Banten was carried out for up to seven (seven) days of the search period. Head of the National SAR Agency (Basarnas) Banten, M. Zainal Arifin explained , today, the search process has entered its third day. In accordance with standard operating procedures (SOP), the search process will be carried out for a week. "In SOP, we search for 7 days," he said when speaking with Radio Republik Indonesia, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Explained, the extent of the search area on the day these three have reached 922.5 nautical mile square. The search process is carried out not only on the surface of the sea, but also in the air, and from the bottom of the sea. "From the air we use helicopter rescue, from the surface we use ships, then underwater there are underwater drones we use all. -friend all, "he concluded. (Photo: Basarnas.go.id)
